channel.title: True or False?
channel.description: Under Cover Runescape Mods? So I was woodcutting, and this lvl 9 brostrider, brags about how many people he reported. Then he said he was a "uc mod" and I'm like wtf? And he tells me it means undercover mod, and so we chatted and it turns out his bro is one of the 'gold crown' mods and is 22. Is there such things as undercover mods?

item.title: True or False?
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“james, post:19, topic:4707”][quote author=Vipsta link=topic=6133.msg64742#msg64742 date=1152845457]
There are undercover moderators, but they obviously won’t tell you about it.

Next time someone says they’re a moderator ask them for the name of the Jagex Moderator. Check the credits page for confirmation then send the details to me.

If they don’t give you the name, report them.

Also, Kaitnieks talked about the possibility that they have a program to view the RS world without a character, sort of like an observer in Counter-Strike. I think that may also be likely, but that its used sparingly.
[/quote]
you work for jagex fosho[/quote]

Well hey, if we can put a xoom feature on our client, why cant they, they could just go to where the problem is and BOOM, causually oberserve an autoer from like a whole screen away.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Vipsta, post:17, topic:4707”]There are undercover moderators, but they obviously won’t tell you about it.

Next time someone says they’re a moderator ask them for the name of the Jagex Moderator. Check the credits page for confirmation then send the details to me.

If they don’t give you the name, report them.

Also, Kaitnieks talked about the possibility that they have a program to view the RS world without a character, sort of like an observer in Counter-Strike. I think that may also be likely, but that its used sparingly.[/quote]

item.title: True or False?
item.dc:creator: @Vipsta Vipsta
item.description:
@Vipsta wrote:

There are undercover moderators, but they obviously won’t tell you about it.

Next time someone says they’re a moderator ask them for the name of the Jagex Moderator. Check the credits page for confirmation then send the details to me.

If they don’t give you the name, report them.

Also, Kaitnieks talked about the possibility that they have a program to view the RS world without a character, sort of like an observer in Counter-Strike. I think that may also be likely, but that its used sparingly.

Read full topic

item.title: True or False?
item.dc:creator: @David David
item.description:
@David wrote:

No. Undercover mods it’s stupid and bullshit.

  1. It would have come out by now
  2. To be honest, JAGeX aren’t decietful to be ‘spying’ on their players.

Just because he says he was someone, doesn’t mean he is.
